column4: hi guys I would like to know why I always to cold boot my system. Im running a tablet pc HP tc 4400 on Ubun. 6.10. If I dont dont cool boot, my keyboard is not responding. Thus, I can't even boot the bios....
if your keyboard is USB check that "usb legacy drivers" are enabled in the bios
maybe, but... still might not be enabled - that was the problem i had the other day when i installed ubuntu it's worth a shot
i don't even know what you mean by cold boot i just know that's what worked for me ;)
